Comments_List: I learned about various biophysical techniques and the underlying theory in how they work. I also learned how the techniques are applied in modern research.

Critical reading of biophysics literature 
Leading of discussions
Proposal writing
This course provided a background on biophysical techniques with a focus on fluorescence and vibrational specctroscopy
The structure of the course was a major strength as it takes a well rounded approach to covering different topics in a manner that is clear and natural.

This course was good at providing an overview of biophysical techniques. One way to improve the course would be to allow students to have more time to read the articles for discussion, either by enforcing that the articles are submitted earlier or by learning about a technique on Wednesday and discussing on the following Monday. As someone who had an extremely busy Monday schedule, it was frustrating to have to read the article and write a discussion report because a classmate couldn't be bothered to submit their article until late Sunday night.
Yes. It covers many topics in a way that doesn't feel forced and understanding the theory of these different techniques is beneficial.
To gain an overview of basic biophysics tools, chemistry literature discussion, and introduction to proposal writing
I would recommend this course to a student interested in biophysical techniques
